arts.ttl: PSG’s Luis Enrique Responds to Donnarumma Backlash After Losing to Arsenal
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain lost 2-0 to Arsenal on Tuesday night at Emirates Stadium. The Parisian side struggled after conceding two goals in the first half and Gianluigi Donnarumma was at the center with errors. Donnarumma made two mistakes that resulted in goals for the home side. arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta gives injury update on 'unbelievable' Arsenal star after substitution vs PSG
arts.sum: Jurrien Timber didn't finish Arsenal's win over PSG as he came off with a muscle issue as Mikel Arteta confessed he's used his defender more regularly than he planned

arts.ttl: 'His fault': Samir Nasri reacts to Arsenal's 2-0 win against PSG and singles out one player for criticism

arts.ttl: Chelsea and PSG Summer Target Questions Why Clubs Hesitated to Pay His True Worth
arts.sum: Victor Osimhen broke his silence over the failed permanent transfer that didn’t happen this past summer window. The Nigerian was linked to Chelsea and Paris Saint-Germain until the final week. Nonetheless, neither pulled the trigger on a deal to secure him from Napoli. arts.ttl: Chelsea Target PSG’s €30M-Rated Defender to Boost Defensive Line, Report Says
arts.sum: Lucas Beraldo is approaching his first full year with Paris Saint-Germain after joining the French giants from São Paulo FC this past January. Nonetheless, one Premier League club appears to be eyeing the defender for a potential move. arts.ttl: Barcelona’s Lamine Yamal Surpasses PSG and Real Madrid Stars in Impressive UCL Record
arts.sum: Seeing teenagers thrive in the big-time stage of the UEFA Champions League is slowly becoming the norm. Nonetheless, FC Barcelona’s Lamine Yamal surpassed a Paris Saint-Germain and Real Madrid player. arts.ttl: Luis Enrique: PSG no match for 'superior' Arsenal
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain coach Luis Enrique said he has no idea how long it will take to turn his side back into a European force after a humbling 2-0 Champions League loss at Arsenal on Tuesday.

arts.ttl: William Saliba says that Ousmane Dembélé’s absence ‘helped’ Arsenal
arts.sum: Ousmane Dembélé (27) has been a key player for Paris Saint-Germain so far this season, and so it was a shock to see that he wasn’t included in the squad…

arts.ttl: Luis Enrique's gamble to leave out 'not ready' Dembélé backfires badly against Arsenal
arts.sum: To fill the big void left by the prolific forward — Dembélé has already scored four goals and delivered three assists in the French league this season — Luis Enrique fielded Désiré Doué and Lee Kang-in up front alongside Bradley Barcola. Despite PSG’s struggles, Luis Enrique took time to try and adjust his lineup, making his first substitutions in the 64th minute when Randal Kolo Muani and Fabian Ruiz came on.
